If you refuse to read subtitles, you're missing a lot of great movies.

A: 10
V: 10 (hi res)

Subtitles: Excellent, with caveat.

There are some missing subs in certain scenes in this version. That's because the subs in this version were taken directly from a dubbed version of the film which is a shorter edit of the film. 

The missing subs were killing me while watching the movie. So I went and downloaded this dubbed version:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6521303/13.Assassins.2010.DVDRip.ENG.H264-BONE

It is A LOT lower quality, almost unwatchable, in my opinion. So I played the audio of dubbed version along-side the video of this hi res one. The dubbed version is edited out where the subtitles are missing. In other words, the subtitles on this version were taken from a different edit of the move, that's why the subs are missing in some places. So story-wise, you won't lose much at the places where the subs are missing, since those scenes were actually edited out in other versions.
